alert.note: Alert for Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 11:32PM EST until December 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Storm total snowfall up 6 inches with higher amounts in the mountains and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Northern Grafton, Southern Carroll, and Southern Grafton Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Heavy wet snow will cause weighted tree limbs of conifers and leafed trees, leading to snapped branches. Isolated to scattered outages possible. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton
